content: to do this after round 2 round 2-4 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around cut yarn leaving a tail for sewing pull the yarn right through the last single_crochet you made thread onto a darning needle and bring the yarn through the front loop of the next stitch from front to back to neaten it up before sewing onto the body tip after round 1 i just count 18scs as i go when i get to 18 i know i have completed 3 rounds without the need for stitch markers etc this only works if you have no interruptions though if the doorbell goes you re scuppered ©ali debuc 2021 assembling the arms and legs should not be stuffed arms attach the arms over rnds 16 and 17 16 sts apart legs attach the legs over rnds 23 and 24 6sts apart make sure the space in the middle of these stitches aligns with the space in the middle of the 16 sts between the arms tip don t fasten your tails or weave in your ends after attaching the limbs until they re all on and you re happy with the placement that way if you need to make adjustments you can easily undo things and reposition until it s right weave in the ends by weaving the tail through a few stitches then bringing the yarn through the body to the other side pull tight cut and let the end disappear into the body embroidering the face if you are going to be using your droplet for stress relief i e throwing it it s best to avoid plastic safety eyes that may cause damage i like to use a separate piece of black yarn or embroidery thread for each eye and for the mouth i insert the needle through the side of the body and thread it through to where i want to embroider then thread the end back out again tie the ends in a gentle knot so as not to disturb my embroidery and weave the ends into the body to hide them away congratulations on your new little drop of wonderful ©ali debuc 2021
